job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate and evaluate code, rather than building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models themselves. It emphasizes human feedback for training and evaluating AI outputs, which aligns more with using AI tools for productivity or as a subject of interaction rather than core AI engineering. There is a lack of specific technical tasks related to AI model development, data engineering for AI, or MLOps, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'train AI models' directly relates to the process of developing or improving AI models, even if it's through human feedback.
The phrase 'help train AI models' indicates involvement in the model training process.
The phrase 'train generative artificial intelligence models' specifies the type of AI models being trained.
The phrase 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models' describes a task directly contributing to the training data or evaluation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' is a form of model evaluation and feedback, which is part of the model development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models' suggests a software engineering background is valued, though the primary focus is on training AI.
The phrase 'talented coders' implies a need for software development skills.
The phrase 'lend your coding expertise' indicates the application of software development skills.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
